tool_description: The Baidu hot search rankings are updated every half hour, showing the latest headlines that Chinese people are most concerned about.
name: Top trending topics on Baidu ( China google )

api_list.name: get the top news on baidu

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://top-trending-topics-on-baidu-china-google.p.rapidapi.com/kn/getBaiDu"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "top-trending-topics-on-baidu-china-google.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://top-trending-topics-on-baidu-china-google.p.rapidapi.com/kn/getBaiDu"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "top-trending-topics-on-baidu-china-google.p.rapidapi.com"

print(response.json())
